nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures, Volume 5: Mechanical Mayhem

Star Wars Adventures, Volume 5: Mechanical Mayhem is a canon trade paperback that collects issues 9 and 12–13 of the comic-book series Star Wars Adventures. It was published by IDW Publishing on March 12, 2019.
These ARE the droids you're looking for! Your favorite disfunctional droid team, R2-D2 and C-3PO, bumbles through the Star Wars universe in these kid-friendly tales.

First, R2-D2 tries to stop an Imperial spy from revealing a Rebel secret. But will C-3PO help, or just get in the way? Then, in a story set in the time of the Clone Wars, Anakin and Padme are desperate to get away from the endless fights, both on the battlefield, and the floor of the Senate. But when there vacation goes haywire, will Artoo and Threepio be able to set things right?
Continuing the family-friendly stories Star Wars Adventures is known for, Volume 5 collects issues #9, 12, and 13.
